backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (reel feed, reel card UI, top nav, mock data) to their source files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary of one-line summaries for each frontend source file, describing the purpose of every component, hook, type, and config file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, accent, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point with a root div and a module script tag loading the React app; title still references the original 3D car game.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component that composes TopNav and ReelFeed in a full-screen dark layout and renders a fixed footer attribution link.
frontend/src/components/ActionIcons.tsx: Vertical action bar with like, comment, share, and save buttons; manages local toggle state for like/save and formats large counts into K/M notation.
frontend/src/components/ReelCard.tsx: Full-screen reel card component with looping video playback, gradient fallback, play/pause/mute controls, overlaid metadata, tags, and right-side ActionIcons.
frontend/src/components/ReelFeed.tsx: Vertical snap-scroll feed that renders all mockReels as ReelCard components, tracks the active index via scroll events, and passes isActive for autoplay control.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with a logo, three tab buttons (Following, For You, Explore) with orange accent active state, and search/create icon buttons.
frontend/src/data/mockReels.ts: Exports an array of six mock Reel objects with sample video URLs, metadata (title, description, author, stats), and tags for use in development/testing.
frontend/src/game/Car.tsx: Empty file intended to contain the 3D car component for the React Three Fiber driving game.
frontend/src/game/CarGame.tsx: Empty file intended to contain the main 3D car game scene/canvas component.
frontend/src/game/Environment.tsx: Empty file intended to contain the 3D environment/track component for the car game.
frontend/src/game/GameState.ts: Empty file intended to define game state types or management logic for the car driving game.
frontend/src/game/HUDOverlay.tsx: Empty file intended to contain the HUD overlay UI component displaying speed and control instructions.
frontend/src/game/MenuOverlay.tsx: Empty file intended to contain the start/pause/restart menu overlay UI component for the game.
frontend/src/game/physics.ts: Empty file intended to contain arcade driving physics logic (acceleration, friction, steering).
frontend/src/game/useFollowCamera.ts: Empty file intended to contain a custom hook for the third-person follow camera that tracks the car.
frontend/src/game/useKeyboardControls.ts: Empty file intended to contain a custom hook for capturing keyboard input (WASD/arrow keys) for car controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisted identity state via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that defines OKLCH-based dark-theme CSS variables, imports Inter and Syne fonts, applies Tailwind base/components/utilities, and adds scrollbar-hide and line-clamp utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/types/reel.ts: Defines the Reel TypeScript interface with fields for id, title, description, author info, video URL, engagement stats, and tags.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with OKLCH CSS-variable-based colors, Inter/Syne font families, custom border radii, glow box shadows, and fade/slide animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 5) tracking the summary, existing features, and image requirements for a reel/short-video app with a 3D car driving game feature.
